query: alter table NPSS_TRANSACTIONS alter column INSTRUMENT_TYPE type CHARACTER VARYING(35);

alter table NPSS_TRANSACTIONS add column TRAN_INFO CHARACTER VARYING(43), add column INSTRUCTION_ID CHARACTER VARYING(35), add column TRAN_REF_ID CHARACTER VARYING(35), add column CATEGORY_PURPOSE_PRTY CHARACTER VARYING(35), add column EXT_ORG_ID_CODE CHARACTER VARYING(4), add column ISSUER_TYPE_CODE CHARACTER VARYING(35), add column DBTR_BIRTH_DATE TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE, add column DBTR_CITY_BIRTH CHARACTER VARYING(35), add column DBTR_COUNTRY CHARACTER VARYING(2), add column EXT_PERSON_ID_CODE CHARACTER VARYING(4), add column EXT_ACCT_ID_CODE CHARACTER VARYING(4), add column CR_ACCT_IDENTIFICATION CHARACTER VARYING(34), add column CR_ACCT_ID_CODE CHARACTER VARYING(4), add column EXT_PURPOSE_CODE CHARACTER VARYING(4), add column EXT_PURPOSE_PRTY CHARACTER VARYING(35);
alter table NPSS_TRANSACTIONS drop column PAYMENT_TYPE;
